ygData.subject: Re: good vs evil unbalance
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i agree. if there is anything that is truly unbalanced against us it is good vs evil. i ve heard of people who think we need a good vs evil semi pvp
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Thom Shartle" <darklingsanction@...>

>I dont have any problem with making a Character more difficult to play, such
>as boosting the EP requirements from level to level. This only makes sense,
>especially taking into account some classes are more powerfull then others.

>My objection is that Godd vs Evil is not balanced out. There should be a
>number of Good cities, a number of Evil Cities and the rest should be true
>Nuetral cities where what you kill determines your relationship to the toen
>not your chosen god.

i agree. if there is anything that is truly unbalanced against us it is good
vs evil. i've heard of people who think we need a good vs evil semi pvp
server, and i just have to laugh at that. what person in their right mind
would want to play an evil person on a server where the odds are so badly
stacked against you? we have dark elves, trolls, and ogres on the evil side,
and humans, half elves, wood elves, high elves, halflings, gnomes, dwarves,
barbarians, and erudites on the good side (minus a few people from those
races who choose an evil class, or just plain worship an evil god, i.e. a
gnome cleric of bertoxxulous). this gives the good races an inherant and
unbalanced advantage in regards to where they can go, and the reactions that
the numerous npcs of the world give them. just last night i got killed
TWICE by a roaming group of npcs in n karana that just happened to be right
there when i crossed the zone border (twice), just because they dont like
shadow knights. evil people really dont have that many areas they can get
to.. which is why i'm hoping that if rumors are true and they ARE working on
a new continent, that it will contain several more playable evil races so we
have more to do. (maybe dark dwarves, altho i think playable orcs would rock
:)). now i'll grant you that most people simply prefer to play as the good
guy (the fools dont know what they're missing!) but that doesnt mean they
have to beat so hard on folks who choose to be eeeeeeevil :) give us
someplace to go! or at least let us evil people who arent of the 3 big evil
races get into grobb and oggok. (in case you dont know, there are a few
spells we can use that to my knowledge can ONLY be found in grobb. this is
somewhat of an annoyance to human shadow knights and necromancers who start
the game KoS by grobb's bashers).

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
